snippet.title: The Computer Spiele Museum's Museum Guide Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the ZX Spectrum game, The Computer Spiele Museum's Museum Guide. This is a game/guide created to promote the museum in Berlin. More info here:
https://www.historyworthplaying.com/de/
http://www.mojontwins.com/2017/03/01/colaboracion-computer-spiele-museum/

From the recording originally sent to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/

Recorded using "rollback", a feature of the emulator which allows you to mark a point, which you can then roll back to later if you get into difficulty, and try again. More info. on the channel "About" page: https://www.youtube.com/user/rzxarchive/about

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
